categories: Category:Star Wars Insider Special Edition 2016 articles

nodes.text: Planning the Prequels is an interview with Benton Jew, the storyboard artist for Star Wars: Episode I The Phantom Menace, including some of his and other artists' sketches from the reference book Star Wars Storyboards: The Prequel Trilogy.
This article was written by Jonathan Wilkins and released in Star Wars Insider 141. It was later reprinted in Star Wars Insider Special Edition 2016.
